entry.title: govanidaksh04/NewsApp: NewsApp is a modern, lightweight, and responsive web application built with React and Vite. It fetches the latest news articles from a news API and displays them in a clean and user-friendly interface. The application leverages Bootstrap for styling and provides a seamless user experience with fast loading times and efficient state management.
entry.content: NewsApp is a modern, lightweight, and responsive web application built with React and Vite. It fetches the latest news articles from a news API and displays them in a clean and user-friendly interface. The application leverages Bootstrap for styling and provides a seamless user experience with fast loading times and efficient state management.

entry.title: meet447/axiomai: AxiomAI is a modern, lightweight AI chat application that provides instant access to advanced language models without requiring any sign-up or authentication. Experience seamless conversations with state-of-the-art AI models in a beautiful, responsive interface.
